backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style list of concise summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining color tokens, themes, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Minimal root React component rendering the HugDaySlideshowPage.
frontend/src/components/effects/AmbientR: Generates animated floating hearts and petals with randomized particle effects.
frontend/src/components/music/MusicToggl: Play/pause button controlling a looping romantic background audio track.
frontend/src/components/slideshow/slides: Main Hug Day scene slide with background art, headline, and message text.
Intro slide with gradient background and welcome text.
frontend/src/components/slideshow/Slides: Slideshow container handling transitions and rendering navigation controls.
Previous/Next buttons with accessibility and disabled-state behavior.
frontend/src/components/slideshow/SlideT: Reusable animated text overlay for slide headlines and subtexts.
frontend/src/components/slideshow/useSli: Hook providing next/previous slide logic and keyboard arrow support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing a backend actor based on authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking. Wraps AuthClient configuration and exposes a useInternetIdentity hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module exporting nothing, used because the frontend has no backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, custom pastel romantic theme colors, fonts, utilities, and animations for the UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/HugDaySlideshowPage.t: Renders the Hug Day slideshow page with intro and main slides, ambient effects, music toggle, and footer branding.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, components, and plugins for the pastel romantic theme.
project_state.json: Holds project metadata, feature requirements, and image specifications for the Hug Day romantic slideshow app.
